Title: Ya ne vernus
Writer: Yaroslava Pulinovich (script by), Oleg Gaze (revisions by)
Actors: Polina Pushkaruk, Vika Lobachova, Andrey Astrakhantsev, Sergey Yatsenyuk
Plot: A young woman who grew up in orphanage is longing to be loved, but does not have it in her to love others. Her teenage looks help her while falsely accused of committing a crime to hide in ...
